description: This file defines a React component for an admin page to create, update, and delete events within an event management platform. It manages state related to the current user, list of events, and form data for new events. It interacts with API endpoints to perform CRUD operations on events and conditionally renders UI based on admin status.

methods.name: emptyEvent
methods.description: Creates and returns a partial Event object with default values, setting start and end times relative to current time.

methods.name: AdminEventsPage
methods.description: Main React component for the admin events management page, handling loading data, creating, updating, and deleting events.
